meanings.definition: Expressing motion in the direction of a particular location.
meanings.sent2: He ran to catch the bus.
meanings.sent3: The cat sprinted to its cozy bed.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed to the vast ocean.
meanings.sent5: The bird flew to the treetop.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate the recipient of an action.
meanings.sent1: I gave the gift to her.
meanings.sent2: They sent a letter to us.
meanings.sent3: The teacher handed the award to him.
meanings.sent4: The chef presented the dish to them.
meanings.sent5: The kind stranger offered help to me.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate the infinitive form of a verb.
meanings.sent3: The dog seems to bark loudly.

meanings.definition: Used to express comparison or proportion.
meanings.sent2: The cake is sweeter than the pie.
meanings.sent3: His excitement is greater than mine.
meanings.sent4: The journey seemed longer than expected.
meanings.sent5: The colors are brighter than before.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate a range or limit.
meanings.sent1: The store is open from 9 to 5.
meanings.sent2: The bookshelf can hold up to 50 books.
meanings.sent3: The temperature ranges from hot to cold.
meanings.sent5: The path leads from the forest to the meadow.
